FAST
for Adobe Photoshop RETOUCH PANEL

Free video course is included

Fast Retouch Panel is an effective plugin for Adobe Photoshop that makes high end retouching easy and fast.


The panel was developed in collaboration with top retouchers.


If you are a pro, the panel will save you hours and make your workflow more convenient.


If you are a beginner in retouching, you may have a good start, as we provide a the introductory video course that demonstrates all the functions of the panel.

See: how it's easy to use

Work examples

  • 1

    FS Retouch

    Professional retouch of skin texture and tone
  • 2

    Anti Glare

    Tool for removing oily shine
  • 3

    Auto Retouch

    Automatic skin texture and tone smoothing
  • 4

    Skin Retouch

    For removing local skin irregularities
  • 5

    Tanned Skin

    Easy and fast sun tan function
  • 6

    White of Eyes

    White of eyes lightening
  • 7

    Eyes

    Tool for eyes correction and change of color
  • 8

    White Teeth

    Quick teeth whitening with natural color set
  • 9

    Sharpness

    Increase local sharpness (eyes, lips and other areas)
  • 10

    Additional editing tools

    • Contrast
    • Matte
    • Volume
    • Dodge&Burn

WHAT'S
INSIDE?

40+
functions

  • Automatic skin smoothing
  • Skin texture boost
  • Frequency separation method
  • Direct access to functions:
    • Shadow/highlights balance
    • RGB, CMYK, Grayscale
    • Operating frequency
    • (8 or 16 bits)
    • Liquify
  • Image and work area resizing function
  • Face tone & Tanned skin function
  • Make-up with flexible color settings
  • Dodge & Burn method
  • Local and global High Pass Sharpness
  • Quick export for Instagram
and a lot more handy features!
